EmailTemplate.description: Closure template if resolution provided over the call
EmailTemplate.name: Resolution over the call
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Good day! Thank you for taking the time to speak with us about your case {!Case.CaseNumber} today.
As discussed, the issue you have been facing is now resolved over the call and the case is marked as closed.
Feel free to reach out to us in case of any further queries.
Regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} Salesforce Configuration Team
